function getFighter(address addr) view returns (tuple(uint256 strength, uint256 agility, uint256 endurance, uint256 totalReps, uint256 level, uint256 wins, uint256 losses, bool exists))
function getChallenge(uint256 challengeId) view returns (tuple(address challenger, address opponent, uint256 wager, uint8 status, address winner))
function fighters(address) view returns (uint256 strength, uint256 agility, uint256 endurance, uint256 totalReps, uint256 level, uint256 wins, uint256 losses, bool exists)
function challenges(uint256) view returns (address challenger, address opponent, uint256 wager, uint8 status, address winner)
event StatsUpdated(address indexed owner, uint256 strength, uint256 agility, uint256 endurance)
event ChallengeCreated(uint256 indexed challengeId, address indexed challenger, address indexed opponent, uint256 wager)
event BattleResolved(uint256 indexed challengeId, address indexed winner, uint256 payout)
